page.title: 12Adventure Game Books
page.content: Adventure game books started in 1983 and now are very popular with both children and teenagers.They are different because you are the hero or heroine.I enjoy the books because they are like a game and a book at the same time.There are fifteen in the series and they are all good.Here are just some of them:The Warlock Of Fire Top Mountain,The Citadel Of Chaos,The Forest Of Doom,The City Of Thieves,Scorpion Swamp and Starship Traveller.You need a pencil, two dice and of course one of the books.They are written by Steve Jackson and Ian Livingstone.At the start of the book there is an Adventure Sheet where you jot down your score and details like what weapons you have and how much gold you own.
